text: Robert Brodnax Glenn was an American Democratic Party politician who served as governor of North Carolina from 1905 to 1909. His time as governor was notable for the expansion of education and public health servicesGOVERNOR ROBERT BRODNAX GLENN, n.d., 1904-1909 along with other reforms.Laws and resolutions of the State of North Carolina.
